name: TesteinRunTest
author: Testein
helpMarkDown: Allows you to trigger your Testein test and watch logs in VSTS

inputs.name: userToken
inputs.label: User Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your user token. Could be found under your user settings in Testein

inputs.name: testId
inputs.label: Test Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Id of test to run. Could be found on url, when editing test

inputs.name: downloadDetails
inputs.label: Download Details
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, Testein task logs will be downloaded to 'Testein-Task-{taskId}.zip'.
